name: KinematicBoarder (Prototype)
description:
This game is not done and probably won't be done.

KinematicBoarder is a prototype of a snowboarding game that I never finished. This was the first 3D project I ever built and shared, but I held off releasing it to try and fix jank. A year later and I haven't fixed any jank, so I'm pulling this out of the vault so more of my early experiments are shared and made public.

I'm incredibly interested in trying to do this kind of game again though. I've got lots of fun ideas to try and keep the game feeling...normal.

Any bugs or jankiness is intentional, and I will probably not be fixing much about it until I try the project idea again in the future.
